title: Best of The Herd: 11/09/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 11/09/2018
description:
Colin says the Steelers and the NFL's enigma and compare them to Mike Tyson while the Patriots are Muhammed Ali. He thinks Aaron Rodgers is sending a message to Mike McCarthy with one specific thing that he has done twice as much as anyone in the NFL this year. Plus, NFL Writer Kevin Clark from The Ringer dispels a myth about Alabama and the NFL that drives Colin crazy

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
